t:
“Congratulations, ma'am. You're having twins,” I said gleefully as I picked up a second heartbeat on my stethoscope.

She smiled, in an odd way, as I picked up another, then another.



My ears started filling up with the sound of hundreds of heartbeats.
c:
Her smile turned into a grin with way too many teeth, as my gleefulness turned to horror.



#doctor #stethoscope #pregnancy #child #twins #heartbeat #demons #possessed
